thread.title: Paris Hilton's mum Kathy claims Jennifer Aniston is PREGNANT and having a girl after star's Oscars appearance
thread.title_full: Paris Hilton's mum Kathy claims Jennifer Aniston is PREGNANT and having a girl after star's Oscars appearance

author: Vicki Newman
title: Paris Hilton's mum Kathy claims Jennifer Aniston is PREGNANT and having a girl after star's Oscars appearance
text:
Kathy Hilton tweeted that Jennifer Aniston is pregnant - and expecting a girl Share   
Jennifer Aniston looked absolutely stunning as she stepped out in a plunging Versace gown at the Oscars - but it gave some people ideas. 
Paris Hilton's mum Kathy told her 103,000 Twitter followers that the Friends star was pregnant and even went as far to say that she's having a girl. 
In a post on Sunday, which has since been deleted, Kathy wrote: "Jennifer Aniston looks so beautiful tonight I am telling you she is having a baby girl 100/ percent " [sic] 
The tweet, which was decorated with smiley faces, flowers and four-leaf clovers, caused some confusion, with someone asking if she meant Natalie Portman, who is expecting her second child with husband Benjamin Millepied. Read More Jennifer is married to Justin Theroux (Photo: Splash News) Kathy's bizarre tweet claiming Jennifer is pregnant (Photo: Twitter) 
But Kathy replied "no", demonstrating that she really was talking about Jennifer. 
However, she later removed the post from her timeline. 
Jennifer, who is married to Justin Theroux, looked stunning at the 89th Academy Award in a black sequined dress which boasted not only a dramatic plunging neckline, but also a slit at the front to reveal her long enviable pins. Jennifer looked stunning (Photo: AFP) Kathy later removed the tweet (Photo: Getty) 
The actress has often been faced with rumours that she is expecting a child, and was once forced to reveal she'd simply had "a big lunch" when she was pictured looking fuller in the belly than usual on holiday. 
She wrote a letter about it, which was published on the Huffington Post , saying: "I may become a mother some day, and since I’m laying it all out there, if I ever do, I will be the first to let you know. 
"But I’m not in pursuit of motherhood because I feel incomplete in some way… Read More She replied "no" when someone asked if she meant Natalie Portman (Photo: Getty) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
